modify.description: Checks if the given http-request is a modification(e.g. of type PATCH).

delete.description: Checks if the given http-request is a deletion(e.g. of type DELETE).

read.description: Checks if the given http-request is a read(e.g. of type GET).

use.description: Checks if the given http-request is a general usage(e.g. of type DELETE/GET/POST/PUT/PATCH).

modify.description: Checks if the given http-request is a general usage(e.g. of type DELETE/GET/POST/PUT/PATCH).

write.description: Checks if the given http-request is a write request(e.g. of type DELETE/GET/POST/PUT/PATCH).

read.description: Checks if the given http-request is a read(e.g. of type GET).

create.description: Checks if the given http-request is a creation(e.g. of type POST).
Checks if the given http-request is a creation(e.g. of type POST).
Checks if the given http-request is a creation(e.g. of type POST).

isInPath.description: Checks the path of http-requests. Returns true, if the leftOperand is a sub-path(or equal) of the rightOperand

eq.description: Checks that both operands are equal.

hasPart.description: Checks that the rightOperand is a sub-set of the leftOperand.

gt.description: Checks that the leftOperand is greater than the rightOperand.

gteq.description: Checks that the leftOperand is greater or equal than the rightOperand.

isAllOf.description: Checks that both sets are equal.

isAnyOf.description: Checks that leftOperand is contained in the rightOperand's set.

anyOf.description: Checks that leftOperand is contained in the rightOperand's set.

isNoneOf.description: Checks that leftOperand is not contained in the rightOperand's set.

isPartOf.description: Checks that rightOperand is contained in the leftOperand's set.

lt.description: Checks that the leftOperand is lesser than the rightOperand.

lteq.description: Checks that the leftOperand is lesser or equal than the rightOperand.

neq.description: Checks that both operands are not equal.

and.description: Requires that all given constraints evaluate to  true.

andSequence.description: Requires that all given constraints evaluate to  true.

or.description: Requires that at least one of the given constraints evaluates to true.

xone.description: Requires that exactly one of the given constraints evaluates to true.

policyUsage.description: Returns the current-time, e.g. the time that the policy is evaluated at.

currentParty.description: Returns the current party, e.g. the issuer of the provided credential.

path.description: Returns the path from the http-request(without host and query-elements).

bodyValue.description: Returns the value from the requested element in the http-body. Requires the body to be in json-format

role.description: Retrieves the role from a verifiable credential for the organization running the PAP. Role needs to be contained in the json as roles[{target:id, names:[role1,role2]}]

currentParty.description: Returns the current party, e.g. the issuer of the provided credential.

type.description: Returns the type of the provided credential.

entityType.description: Returns the entity-type from an ngsi-ld request, either from the path or the request body.

entityTypeGroup.description: Returns the entity-type from an ngsi-ld request, either from the path or the request body.

dateTime.description: Returns the current time(taken from the Open-Policy-Agent system-time).

dayOfWeek.description: Returns the day of week from the current time(taken from the Open-Policy-Agent system-time).

hourOfDay.description: Returns the hour of day from the current time(taken from the Open-Policy-Agent system-time).

role.description: Retrieves the role from a verifiable credential for the organization running the PAP. Role needs to be contained in the json as roles[{target:id, names:[role1,role2]}]

currentParty.description: Returns the current party, e.g. the issuer of the provided credential.

relatedParty.description: Returns the related party from the targeted TMForum Entity. Retrieves the entity from the request's target.

owner.description: Returns the related party with role `Owner` from the list of related parties.

relatedParty_role.description: Returns the role of the related party.

validFor_startDateTime.description: Returns the start of validity for a given entity.

validFor_endDateTime.description: Returns the end of validity for a given entity.

lifecycleStatus.description: Returns the current lifeCycleStatus for a requested TMF-Entity.

resource.description: Returns the type for a requested TMF-Resource.

leftOperand.description: Retrieves the claim from the incoming Verifiable Credential by its Json-Path.

assignee.description: Is the incoming User-ID the same as the given ID.

any.description: Allows access for any requesting user.

uid.description: Checks that the request target is equal to the given id.

target.description: Checks that the request target is equal to the given id.

constraint.description: Checks that all included constraints are true.

credentialSubjectType.description: Checks that the provided Verifiable Credentials subject type is equal to the provided one.
